person.persName: James H. Faircloth (Mercer County Boot maker)

body.p: Native of North Carolina. Worked as a boot maker in Mercer County.

Spouse: Mary Jane Faircloth then Minerva J Faircloth
Children: James Arthur Faircloth, Mary B Faircloth, Elisha R Faircloth, Henry H Faircloth
